channel.title: Secure ls
channel.description:
open LS.conf, add this to it
Code: [code]<entry key="lspass">password</entry>[/code] Now open world.xml and add this to it
Code: [code]<entry key="lspass">password</entry>[/code] Replace password with the password you want
now go to src/org/rscdaemon/server/util/Config.java and find
Code: [code]LS_PORT = Integer.parseInt(props.getProperty("lsport"));[/code] unde r that put
Code: [code]LS_PASSWORD = props.getProperty("lspass");[/code] now find
Code: [code]public static String SERVER_IP, SERVER_NAME, RSCD_HOME, CONF_DIR, SERVER_LOCATION, LS_IP;[/code] replace that with
Code: [code]public static String SERVER_IP, SERVER_NAME, RSCD_HOME, CONF_DIR, SERVER_LOCATION, LS_IP, LS_PASSWORD;[/code] k save and close that
now go to /src/org/rscdaemon/server/packetbuilder/loginserver/MiscPacketBuilder.java
find
Code: [code]s.addShort(Config.SERVER_NUM);[/code] under that put
Code: [code]s.addBytes(Config.LS_PASSWORD.getBytes());[/code] save and close that. Now go to /src/org/rscdaemon/ls/util/Config.java and find
Code: [code]LS_PORT = Integer.parseInt(props.getProperty("lsport"));[/code] and under that put
Code: [code]LS_PASSWORD = props.getProperty("lspass");[/code] then find
Code: [code]public static String RSCDLS_HOME, CONF_DIR, LOG_DIR, MYSQL_HOST, MYSQL_DB, MYSQL_USER, MYSQL_PASS, LS_IP, QUERY_IP;[/code] and replace it with
Code: [code]public static String RSCDLS_HOME, CONF_DIR, LOG_DIR, MYSQL_HOST, MYSQL_DB, MYSQL_USER, MYSQL_PASS, LS_IP, QUERY_IP, LS_PASSWORD;[/code] save and close that. Now go to /src/org/rscdaemon/ls/packethandler/loginserver/RegisterWorld.java and find
Code: [code]int id = p.readShort();[/code] then underneath that put
Code: [code]String passrecv = p.readString().trim();[/code] then find
Code: [code]if(server.getWorld(id) == null) {[/code] replace it with
Code: [code]if(server.getWorld(id) == null&&passrecv!=null) {[/code] then underneath that put
Code: [code]if(!passrecv.equals(Config.LS_PASSWORD)){ System.out.println("Failed to authenticate world "+id); return; } [/code] close, save, compile, should be working.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 03, 2009, 02:01:16 pm[/size][hr]Forgot imports for worldloader.
[code]import org.rscdaemon.server.util.*;[/code]
I did not write this, but someone can fix it up abit?
